comments: The sample works fine if you remove the ; from the end of the "absolute path" entry field. The button is enabling when data is provided to amll input fields, no code change is required, the sample works as is. I wasn't able to reproduce your problem. The only problem in this sample is that if you use the Browse button to look for the log file a ';' is appended to the file path and for this reason the import fails. If youy remove the ';' from the file path everything works well.
This has normal severity; moving to 4.3
*** Bug 152510 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

traces.message: IWAT0075E The log parser's initialization parameters are not set properly. IWAT0243E The log file D:\TPTP\TPTP_0606_sdk\eclipse\workspace\LogParserProject\syslog.txt; does not exist.
